SELECT acc_sign.ID, acc_sign.user_code, acc_sign.USER_NAME, acc_sign.SIGN_SERIAL_DAYS, acc_sign.SIGN_TOTAL_DAYS, acc_sign.STATUS, acc_sign.SIGN_TIME, acc_sign.ISACTIVE from acc_sign WHERE acc_sign.STATUS !='1'
AND acc_sign.CORP_CODE = #{corp_code}
AND ( acc_sign.user_code LIKE concat('%', #{search_value},'%') OR acc_sign.USER_NAME LIKE concat('%', #{search_value},'%') OR acc_sign.SIGN_SERIAL_DAYS LIKE concat('%', #{search_value},'%') OR acc_sign.SIGN_TOTAL_DAYS LIKE concat('%', #{search_value},'%') OR acc_sign.STATUS LIKE concat('%', #{search_value},'%') OR acc_sign.SIGN_TIME LIKE concat('%', #{search_value},'%') OR acc_sign.ISACTIVE LIKE concat('%', #{search_value},'%') )
ORDER BY acc_sign.ID
